price: 54. (Alle) waa Kan ka abuuray dadka biyo, markaas u yeelay xigto iyo xididba. Rabbigaana waa Mid Wax Walba Kara.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ بَشَرٗا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبٗا وَصِهۡرٗاۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī khalaqa mina al-māi basharan fajaʿalahu nasaban waṣih'ran wakāna rabbuka qadīran
